verbose_text: Salt stress induced NH 4 + accumulation has been associated to the inactivation of specific enzymes involved in NH 4 + homeostasis [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR], including glutamine synthetase (GS) and glutamate dehydrogenase (GDH) which can maintain NH 4 + cellular concentrations below toxicity levels by incorporating it into amino acids [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: Salt stress induced NH 4  +  accumulation has been associated to the inactivation of specific enzymes involved in NH 4  +  homeostasis
